game.name: THE LAST PORTRAIT
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: THE LAST PORTRAIT is a spooky adventure that takes you to the abandoned Ashwood Manor. You're on a mission to steal a supposedly cursed painting from the old villa. Solve the difficult puzzles that secure the house and escape the ghost that guards the property!
game.shortDescriptionEn: THE LAST PORTRAIT is a spooky adventure that takes you to the abandoned Ashwood Manor. You're on a mission to steal a supposedly cursed painting from the old villa. Solve the difficult puzzles that secure the house and escape the ghost that guards the property!
